name: guia-hoteles
description: Proyecto del curso Full Stack Web Development

scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist -o dist/index.html --htmlmin true && usemin we.html -d dist -o dist/we.html --htmlmin true && usemin contact.html -d dist -o dist/contact.html --htmlmin true && usemin prices.html -d dist -o dist/prices.html --htmlmin true && usemin terms.html -d dist -o dist/terms.html --htmlmin true
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin

author: Angel Herrarte
